name: The Tale of a Young Boy
name_original: The Tale of a Young Boy
description:
The Tale of a Young Boy - which is not an attempt to rip off Undertale - is a simple text RPG about a young boy of around 7 (who has a name of your choice) who wakes up to find his parents gone. The game is not too heavily story-based (I mean like,  barely anything at all) so it mostly involves commands and not too much dialogue.

<<++WARNING: THIS IS NOT A FULLY-FLEDGED VIDEO GAME AND IS UNSTABLE AND INCOMPLETE DUE TO EARLY RELEASE TIMES!++>>

Creators:

Daniel Q

Stuart B
